channel.title: Podcasts on Anand Chowdhary
channel.description: Recent content in Podcasts on Anand Chowdhary

item.title: State of the Podcasts 2018
item.description: I started really consuming audio content in the form of podcasts and audiobooks about two years ago, and I’m very often asked what podcasts I listen to. This is the first list in a series of reviews about my daily drivers of content, services, and products.
